input.label: Enter your text
input.placeholder: Type something like 'birthday party' or 'coffee with friends'...

colorPalette.label: Color Palette
colorPalette.description: Choose a color theme for your emojis

emojiCount.label: Emoji Count
emojiCount.description: Select how many emojis to generate (1-5)

emojiPersonality.label: Use Emoji Personality
emojiPersonality.description: Personalize emojis based on your vibe preferences
emojiPersonality.notSet: Set your personality in Settings first

results.title: Results
results.aiInfo: Results are AI-generated and may vary. Tap to copy emojis.

error.inputTooLong: Input text is too long (max {max} characters)
error.rateLimit: Please wait a moment before generating again
error.internal: Internal server error. Please try again.
error.invalidArgument: Invalid input. Please check your text.
error.permissionDenied: Permission denied. Please check your connection.
error.serviceUnavailable: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

empty.message: Enter text above to generate emojis

empty.title: No History Yet
empty.message: Your generated emojis will appear here

confirm.title: Clear History?
confirm.message: This will permanently delete all your emoji history. This action cannot be undone.

success.title: History Cleared
success.message: All history has been cleared successfully.

confirm.title: Clear Personality?
confirm.message: This will reset all your personality preferences. You can set a new personality anytime.

success.title: Personality Cleared
success.message: Your personality preferences have been cleared.

warning.title: Reset Personality?
warning.message: Setting a new personality will clear your current preferences. Continue?

about.title: About
about.appInfo: Word2Emoji - Convert text to emojis using AI

instruction.generate: Tap Generate to create emoji options

advanced.title: Advanced Options
